name: Evangelist
dialog: Flee from the wrath to come. - Matthew 3:7
Strive to enter through the narrow door. - Luke 13:24

name: Help
dialog: Take my hand and I will help you out of the Slough of Despond.

name: Goodwill
dialog: I will open the gate for you. Welcome to the path of salvation.

name: Interpreter
dialog: Here you will learn the ways of the Christian life.

name: Discretion
dialog: Welcome to the Palace Beautiful. Rest and regain your strength.

name: Apollyon
dialog: You will face great battles in the Valley of Humiliation.

name: Faithful
dialog: Stay strong, Christian. Together we will overcome the Valley of the Shadow of Death.
location: Valley of the Shadow of Death

name: Vanity Fair Merchant
dialog: Buy my goods! Indulge in the pleasures of Vanity Fair.

name: Giant Despair
dialog: You will never escape Doubting Castle!

name: Shepherds
dialog: Welcome to the Delectable Mountains. Here you can see the Celestial City in the distance.
